text: Caño Garza Airport is an airport serving one of the many oil production facilities in the Casanare Department of Colombia. The nearest population center is Trinidad, south of the runway. ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Caño Garza *FallingRain - Caño Garza Airport Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Caño Garza Airport
